component: A component is a central building block in Angular that contains logic and a view.
To build a component, the @Component decorator is used.
directive: A directive changes the behavior or appearance of elements on the page.
It is easy to create a custom directive.
rxjs: RxJS is a library for working with data streams reactively.
Observables are a core tool in RxJS.
